channel.title: Couple questions :)
channel.description:
:o Okay, So I wanted to start my own server, I am pretty good at coding but...I am using Allstar-scape as a base, Im going to change almost everything in it. I was wanting to know some of the following: 1.I think i understand how to add models to the client, but how do I make them workable in the server? 2.How can i change the names of magic spells? 3.Whats a good client to use with allstar-scape? I tried Project Courage and it has some items lookin weird, like nature runes look really messed up and some other tiny bugs?
-Chris(Mod Chris on Alias Scape)

item.title: Couple questions :)
item.dc:creator: @Christopher_L Christopher_L
item.description:
@Christopher_L wrote:

The last question isn’t really…

Mind helping instead of complaining about me doing it in the wrong section?

Read full topic

item.title: Couple questions :)

item.description:
@Christopher_L wrote:

:o
Okay, So I wanted to start my own server, I am pretty good at coding but…I am using Allstar-scape as a base, Im going to change almost everything in it. I was wanting to know some of the following:
1.I think i understand how to add models to the client, but how do I make them workable in the server?
2.How can i change the names of magic spells?
3.Whats a good client to use with allstar-scape? I tried Project Courage and it has some items lookin weird, like nature runes look really messed up and some other tiny bugs?
